thread.title: UFC fighter Angela Hill did a perfect Street Fighter impersonation during a staredown
thread.title_full: UFC fighter Angela Hill did a perfect Street Fighter impersonation during a staredown

author: Hector Diaz
title: UFC fighter Angela Hill did a perfect Street Fighter impersonation during a staredown
text:
Get her in the next game, Capcom! 
Angela Hill's full Street Fighter routine at #UFCHouston weigh-ins @AngieOverkill pic.twitter.com/Hm52Pmf0QA 
— Mike Dyce (@mikedyce) February 3, 2017 Angela Hill has a fight coming up at UFC Fight Night 104 against Jessica Andrade. But if the weigh-in is any indication, it looks like Street Fighter’s Sagat is going to take Hill’s place.
Hill has the look down. All you need are the shorts and an intimidating eyepatch to pull it off. We’ll see on Saturday if she has all the combos memorized for the fight.
Hill even has the fighting stance down. She looks like a perfect video game sprite. In fact, Capcom needs to include her as a playable character in the next Street Fighter . Here’s what it might look like.
